professional_summary: Passionate Software Engineer with 5+ years of experience in cloud computing, full-stack development, and AI solutions. AWS Certified Architect skilled in scalable system design, CI/CD automation, and AI integrations. Known for delivering technical solutions that meet business goals and mentoring junior developers.

responsibilities: Designed and built scalable cloud services with AWS technologies
Optimized CI/CD pipelines to improve deployment efficiency
Developed full-stack solutions using Python, TypeScript, and React
Mentored junior developers and led code review sessions
Created internal tools to automate business workflows
Enhanced system performance through refactoring legacy code
Assisted in cloud migrations and serverless application development
Provided technical support for cloud customers
Troubleshot networking and service configuration issues
Authored knowledge base articles to assist customer self-service
